page.title: 16THE PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: {The present school was built in 1906 and Mr. Henry Grice of Cremer Street remembers the first day. The school is a collection of buildings surrounded by Barford Rd.,George St., and Cremer St.{It is on a very small {site of one acre and we have no field. There is a junior department of 254 children and an infant department of 154. Until 1957 the children came to this school until they were 14 but then the new secondary modern school (now the High School) opened. We have a separate craft room and a{heated {indoor swimming pool}which we use all the year round. {A NEW SCHOOL is being built}at a site off Holway Road near to the High School. It will cost{Â£875,000.}It will open in September 1986. We have made a model of the old school and a video film of the new one being built.
